slide.title: strrpos() and strripos()
slide.blurb: strr(i)pos() now searches the full needle inside the haystack, and not only the first character of it.
slide.example:
<?php
	$haystack = "There are now ten more countries in Europe";
	$needle   = "The Netherlands";

	$pos = strrpos($haystack, $needle);
	var_dump($pos);
?>
